_source.text: Aberforth was not exactly someone he would call a friend, and Percy knew better than to think this precarious alliance would solve any of his problems... but he couldn't discount the fact that there was now at least one person in this world who knew that if he had it to do all over again, Percy would have done a lot of things differently.

text: Aberforth was not exactly someone he would call a friend, and Percy knew **better** **than** to think this

_source.text: Actually, I know for a fact that my equipment can do much better than the above Jupiter picture, but as you know it's hard to get anything sharp out of an object some 10-20 degrees over the horizon, especially when staring across tubrulent air over a body of water.
